analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/23/0x32d8a198462ba3791b9f144c77729f9131ec2a17.sol:
	Contract HarmonyBountyToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/23/0x32d8a198462ba3791b9f144c77729f9131ec2a17.sol#216)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/23/0x32d8a198462ba3791b9f144c77729f9131ec2a17.sol#86) is not in mixedCase
